cards.name: Adder-Staff Boggart
cards.text: When Adder-Staff Boggart enters the battlefield, clash with an opponent. If you win, put a +1/+1 counter on Adder-Staff Boggart. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)

cards.name: Æthersnipe
cards.text:
When Æthersnipe enters the battlefield, return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
Evoke {1}{U}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Ajani Goldmane
cards.text:
+1: You gain 2 life.
−1: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn.
−6: Put a white Avatar creature token onto the battlefield. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to your life total."

cards.name: Amoeboid Changeling
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
{T}: Target creature gains all creature types until end of turn.
{T}: Target creature loses all creature types until end of turn.

cards.name: Ancient Amphitheater
cards.text:
As Ancient Amphitheater enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Giant card from your hand. If you don't, Ancient Amphitheater enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: The arbiter Galanda Feudkiller judges Lorwyn's squabbles from a lofty perspective.

cards.name: Aquitect's Will
cards.text: Put a flood counter on target land. That land is an Island in addition to its other types for as long as it has a flood counter on it. If you control a Merfolk, draw a card.
cards.flavor: There is nowhere on Lorwyn that the Merrow Lanes cannot go.

cards.name: Arbiter of Knollridge
cards.text:
Vigilance
When Arbiter of Knollridge enters the battlefield, each player's life total becomes the highest life total among all players.
cards.flavor: Though giants are mortal, they live so long and on such a grand scale that many small folk don't believe they ever truly die.

cards.name: Ashling the Pilgrim
cards.text: {1}{R}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Ashling the Pilgrim. If this is the third time this ability has resolved this turn, remove all +1/+1 counters from Ashling the Pilgrim, and it deals that much damage to each creature and each player.

cards.name: Ashling's Prerogative
cards.text:
As Ashling's Prerogative enters the battlefield, choose odd or even. (Zero is even.)
Each creature with converted mana cost of the chosen value has haste.
Each creature without converted mana cost of the chosen value enters the battlefield tapped.

cards.name: Auntie's Hovel
cards.text:
As Auntie's Hovel enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Goblin card from your hand. If you don't, Auntie's Hovel enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: The Stinkdrinker warren's hill of salvaged trinkets is large enough to cut a door in.

cards.name: Austere Command
cards.text:
Choose two —
• Destroy all artifacts.
• Destroy all enchantments.
• Destroy all creatures with converted mana cost 3 or less.
• Destroy all creatures with converted mana cost 4 or greater.

cards.name: Avian Changeling
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
Flying
cards.flavor: Today it flies with the flock. Tomorrow it may wake to find them gone, its body in an unfamiliar form.

cards.name: Axegrinder Giant
cards.flavor: The angriest of giants are often the most skillful weaponsmiths. Their grudges fuel endless sessions at the forge, all the while growling ferociously to themselves.

cards.name: Battle Mastery
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
cards.flavor:
"Boom Boom Boots the size of oxcarts, then an axe like a falling sun. Elves scattered. Trees scattered. Even the hills ran for the hills"
—Clachan Tales

cards.name: Battlewand Oak
cards.text:
Whenever a Forest enters the battlefield under your control, Battlewand Oak gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Whenever you cast a Treefolk spell, Battlewand Oak gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.name: Benthicore
cards.text:
When Benthicore enters the battlefield, put two 1/1 blue Merfolk Wizard creature tokens onto the battlefield.
Tap two untapped Merfolk you control: Untap Benthicore. It gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

cards.name: Black Poplar Shaman
cards.text: {2}{B}: Regenerate target Treefolk.
cards.flavor: It absorbs the pain of other treefolk, which leaves it bitter, yet addicted to the sensation of agony.

cards.name: Blades of Velis Vel
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
Up to two target creatures each get +2/+0 and gain all creature types until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "The changing kind suffers as we do. We must join as one to quench our tyrants!"

cards.name: Blind-Spot Giant
cards.text: Blind-Spot Giant can't attack or block unless you control another Giant.
cards.flavor: Among the solitude-loving giantkind, teamwork is unusual. But he appreciates hearing the occasional "Swing down and to your left."

cards.name: Bog Hoodlums
cards.text:
Bog Hoodlums can't block.
When Bog Hoodlums enters the battlefield, clash with an opponent. If you win, put a +1/+1 counter on Bog Hoodlums. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)

cards.name: Bog-Strider Ash
cards.text:
Swampwalk
Whenever a player casts a Goblin spell, you may pay {G}. If you do, you gain 2 life.
cards.flavor: "If you want to test wisdom, offer it to fools and watch how they tear it up."

cards.name: Boggart Birth Rite
cards.text: Return target Goblin card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: Auntie excitedly held up the squalling newborn. "This one looks like Byoog! Maybe he'll tell us what he saw and felt in the beyond."

cards.name: Boggart Forager
cards.text: {R}, Sacrifice Boggart Forager: Target player shuffles his or her library.
cards.flavor:
"Reach in this hole, lose a hand. Reach in that hole, find a sparkly."
—Auntie wisdom

cards.name: Boggart Harbinger
cards.text: When Boggart Harbinger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Goblin card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

cards.name: Boggart Loggers
cards.text:
Forestwalk
{2}{B}, Sacrifice Boggart Loggers: Destroy target Treefolk or Forest.
cards.flavor: Auntie Flint lent axes to Nibb and Gyik, thinking they'd share their experiences with her. She's still waiting for them to come back.

cards.name: Boggart Mob
cards.text:
Champion a Goblin (When this enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another Goblin you control. When this leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.)
Whenever a Goblin you control deals combat damage to a player, you may put a 1/1 black Goblin Rogue creature token onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Boggart Shenanigans
cards.text: Whenever another Goblin you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may have Boggart Shenanigans deal 1 damage to target player.
cards.flavor: Boggarts revel in discovering new sensations, from the texture of an otter pellet to the squeak of a dying warren mate.

cards.name: Boggart Sprite-Chaser
cards.text: As long as you control a Faerie, Boggart Sprite-Chaser gets +1/+1 and has flying.
cards.flavor:
"Auntie pointed out to the faerie how much mischief a flying boggart could wreak, and a beautiful new friendship was born."
—A tale of Auntie Grub

cards.name: Briarhorn
cards.text:
Flash
When Briarhorn enters the battlefield, target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
Evoke {1}{G} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Brigid, Hero of Kinsbaile
cards.text:
First strike
{T}: Brigid, Hero of Kinsbaile deals 2 damage to each attacking or blocking creature target player controls.
cards.flavor: Thanks to one champion archer, the true borders of Kinsbaile extend an arrow's flight beyond the buildings.

cards.name: Brion Stoutarm
cards.text:
Lifelink
{R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature other than Brion Stoutarm: Brion Stoutarm deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target player.

cards.name: Broken Ambitions
cards.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. Clash with an opponent. If you win, that spell's controller puts the top four cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)

cards.name: Burrenton Forge-Tender
cards.text:
Protection from red
Sacrifice Burrenton Forge-Tender: Prevent all damage a red source of your choice would deal this turn.
cards.flavor: "We are a clachan of smiths. The forge is as comfortable to us as a small fire during a cool winter's evening."

cards.name: Cairn Wanderer
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
As long as a creature card with flying is in a graveyard, Cairn Wanderer has flying. The same is true for fear, first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, landwalk, lifelink, protection, reach, trample, shroud, and vigilance.

cards.name: Captivating Glance
cards.text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of your end step, clash with an opponent. If you win, gain control of enchanted creature. Otherwise, that player gains control of enchanted creature. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)

cards.name: Caterwauling Boggart
cards.text:
Each Goblin you control can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.
Each Elemental you control can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.
cards.flavor:
"As far as I can tell, that frog dangling from the stick serves absolutely no purpose whatsoever."
—Gaddock Teeg

cards.name: Ceaseless Searblades
cards.text: Whenever you activate an ability of an Elemental, Ceaseless Searblades gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Flamekins' fires burn cool until they decide otherwise.

cards.name: Cenn's Heir
cards.text: Whenever Cenn's Heir attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other attacking Kithkin.
cards.flavor: His home clachan's familial spirit bolsters his own, but he will be ready to preside over the town as cenn only after he learns to project that strength to others.

cards.name: Chandra Nalaar
cards.text:
+1: Chandra Nalaar deals 1 damage to target player.
−X: Chandra Nalaar deals X damage to target creature.
−8: Chandra Nalaar deals 10 damage to target player and each creature he or she controls.

cards.name: Changeling Berserker
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
Haste
Champion a creature (When this enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another creature you control. When this leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.)

cards.name: Changeling Hero
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
Champion a creature (When this enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another creature you control. When this leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.)
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

cards.name: Changeling Titan
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
Champion a creature (When this enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another creature you control. When this leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.)

cards.name: Cloudcrown Oak
cards.text: Reach (This can block creatures with flying.)
cards.flavor:
"Clever folk build their homes near cloudcrowns. If a hawk or even just a faerie tries to swoop in, it'll get swatted from here to Cloverdell."
—Calydd, kithkin farmer

cards.name: Cloudgoat Ranger
cards.text:
When Cloudgoat Ranger enters the battlefield, put three 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.
Tap three untapped Kithkin you control: Cloudgoat Ranger gets +2/+0 and gains flying until end of turn.

cards.name: Cloudthresher
cards.text:
Flash
Reach (This can block creatures with flying.)
When Cloudthresher enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each creature with flying and each player.
Evoke {2}{G}{G} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Colfenor's Plans
cards.text:
When Colfenor's Plans enters the battlefield, exile the top seven cards of your library face down.
You may look at and play cards exiled with Colfenor's Plans.
Skip your draw step.
You can't cast more than one spell each turn.

cards.name: Colfenor's Urn
cards.text:
Whenever a creature with toughness 4 or greater is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may exile it.
At the beginning of the end step, if three or more cards have been exiled with Colfenor's Urn, sacrifice it. If you do, return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.

cards.name: Consuming Bonfire
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Consuming Bonfire deals 4 damage to target non-Elemental creature.
• Consuming Bonfire deals 7 damage to target Treefolk creature.
cards.flavor:
"The elves use treefolk to drive us away. It is time to remove their tools."
—Vessifrus, flamekin demagogue

cards.name: Crib Swap
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
Exile target creature. Its controller puts a 1/1 colorless Shapeshifter creature token with changeling onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Crush Underfoot
cards.text: Choose a Giant creature you control. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature.
cards.flavor:
Five-toed grave
—Kithkin phrase meaning
"a giant's footprint"

cards.name: Cryptic Command
cards.text:
Choose two —
• Counter target spell.
• Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
• Tap all creatures your opponents control.
• Draw a card.

cards.name: Dauntless Dourbark
cards.text:
Dauntless Dourbark's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control plus the number of Treefolk you control.
Dauntless Dourbark has trample as long as you control another Treefolk.

cards.name: Dawnfluke
cards.text:
Flash
When Dawnfluke enters the battlefield, prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
Evoke {W} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Deathrender
Deeptread Merrow
cards.text: {U}: Deeptread Merrow gains islandwalk until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "My success at navigating the Dark Meanders irritates the Inkfathom school. They consider themselves peerless divers, but I try to remind them that they cannot own commodities like bravery and cunning."

cards.name: Dolmen Gate
cards.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to attacking creatures you control.
cards.flavor: Lorwyn's stones resonate with the place from which they were hewed. Though taken far, still they call to their home when silence is upon the land.

cards.name: Doran, the Siege Tower
cards.text: Each creature assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.
cards.flavor: "Each year that passes rings you inwardly with memory and might. Wield your heart, and the world will tremble."

cards.name: Dread
cards.text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Whenever a creature deals damage to you, destroy it.
When Dread is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

cards.name: Dreamspoiler Witches
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a spell during an opponent's turn, you may have target creature get -1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: At night, the faeries steal dreamstuff for their queen. At daybreak, countless creatures wake weak and hollow.

cards.name: Drowner of Secrets
cards.text: Tap an untapped Merfolk you control: Target player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
cards.flavor: Merrows consider themselves the keepers of Lorwyn's past—and consider it their duty to edit when necessary.

cards.name: Ego Erasure
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
Creatures target player controls get -2/-0 and lose all creature types until end of turn.
cards.flavor: When all is taken away, all are equal.

cards.name: Elvish Branchbender
cards.text: {T}: Until end of turn, target Forest becomes an X/X Treefolk creature in addition to its other types, where X is the number of Elves you control.
cards.flavor: "How do the vinebred feel? Fah! We do not ask the puppet how it feels when the puppeteer bids it dance."

cards.name: Elvish Eulogist
cards.text: Sacrifice Elvish Eulogist: You gain 1 life for each Elf card in your graveyard.
cards.flavor: "No matter how adept our artistic skill, our effigies can never hope to capture the vibrant beauty of a living elf. Perhaps that is truly why we mourn."

cards.name: Elvish Handservant
cards.text: Whenever a player casts a Giant spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Elvish Handservant.
cards.flavor: The hardest lesson for any elf to learn is humility. It takes a giant to teach that.

cards.name: Elvish Harbinger
cards.text:
When Elvish Harbinger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Elf card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

cards.name: Elvish Promenade
cards.text: Put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token onto the battlefield for each Elf you control.
cards.flavor: The faultless and immaculate castes form the lower tiers of elvish society, with the exquisite caste above them. At the pinnacle is the perfect, a consummate blend of aristocrat and predator.

cards.name: Entangling Trap
cards.text: Whenever you clash, tap target creature an opponent controls. If you won, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. (This ability triggers after the clash ends.)

cards.name: Epic Proportions
cards.text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +5/+5 and has trample.
cards.flavor: From mite to mighty.

cards.name: Ethereal Whiskergill
cards.text:
Flying
Ethereal Whiskergill can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
cards.flavor: Fallowsages debate whether the whiskergill is native to the Dark Meanders or merely dreamstuff made real.

cards.name: Exiled Boggart
cards.text: When Exiled Boggart dies, discard a card.
cards.flavor: Among the boggarts, there is only one real rule: all new treasures and experiences must be shared. Those who hoard their gifts commit the one truly unforgivable sin.

cards.name: Eyeblight's Ending
cards.text: Destroy target non-Elf creature.
cards.flavor:
"Those without beauty are Lorwyn's greatest tumor. The winnowers have an unpleasant duty, but a necessary one."
—Eidren, perfect of Lys Alana

cards.name: Eyes of the Wisent
cards.text: Whenever an opponent casts a blue spell during your turn, you may put a 4/4 green Elemental creature token onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
Calm as a wisent's watch
—Elvish expression meaning "safe"

cards.name: Facevaulter
cards.text: {B}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Facevaulter gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Boggarts get so excited when they find something new to smash that they really don't notice who gets underfoot.

cards.name: Faerie Harbinger
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
When Faerie Harbinger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Faerie card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

cards.name: Faerie Tauntings
cards.text: Whenever you cast a spell during an opponent's turn, you may have each opponent lose 1 life.
cards.flavor: Beneath the fae's constant pranks runs a subtler undercurrent of mockery: the influence of Oona, their hidden queen.

cards.name: Faerie Trickery
cards.text: Counter target non-Faerie spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
cards.flavor: The fae are so quick and their life spans so short that it's difficult to get retribution for their pranks.

cards.name: Fallowsage
cards.text: Whenever Fallowsage becomes tapped, you may draw a card.
cards.flavor: Memories of ages past are said to swim the minds of lounging fallowsages.

cards.name: Familiar's Ruse
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Familiar's Ruse, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.
Counter target spell.
cards.flavor: Because of their capricious nature, faeries can serve as living lenses for disruptive magic.

cards.name: Fathom Trawl
cards.text: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal three nonland cards. Put the nonland cards revealed this way into your hand, then put the rest of the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Faultgrinder
cards.text:
Trample
When Faultgrinder enters the battlefield, destroy target land.
Evoke {4}{R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Favor of the Mighty
cards.text: Each creature with the highest converted mana cost has protection from all colors.
cards.flavor:
"What does a mountain fear of a fly? Giants are barely aware of us, let alone afraid."
—Gaddock Teeg

cards.name: Fertile Ground
cards.text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds one mana of any color to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).
cards.flavor: Pretty, valuable, and delicious—a boggart thief's trifecta.

cards.name: Final Revels
cards.text:
Choose one —
• All creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
• All creatures get -0/-2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: One whiff of the sweet, pungent scent leads to euphoria—or to an early grave.

cards.name: Fire-Belly Changeling
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
{R}: Fire-Belly Changeling gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than twice each turn.
cards.flavor:
"My ears say it hisses. My fingers say it burns."
—Auntie Wort

cards.name: Fistful of Force
cards.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Clash with an opponent. If you win, that creature gets an additional +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)

cards.name: Flamekin Bladewhirl
cards.text: As an additional cost to cast Flamekin Bladewhirl, reveal an Elemental card from your hand or pay {3}.
cards.flavor:
"The elves may try to confine us, but they will learn that our blazing spirit can never be suppressed."
—Vessifrus, flamekin demagogue

cards.name: Flamekin Brawler
cards.text: {R}: Flamekin Brawler gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: When he hits people, they stay hit.

cards.name: Flamekin Harbinger
cards.text: When Flamekin Harbinger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Elemental card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

cards.name: Flamekin Spitfire
cards.text: {3}{R}: Flamekin Spitfire deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: Some flamekin warriors explore the art of coherence, an ancient discipline that harnesses the chaos of fire and focuses it with pinpoint precision.

cards.name: Fodder Launch
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Fodder Launch, sacrifice a Goblin.
Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn. Fodder Launch deals 5 damage to that creature's controller.
cards.flavor: Leave it to a boggart to come up with a projectile as disgusting as it is deadly.

cards.name: Footbottom Feast
cards.text:
Put any number of target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: The scent of rot and vinegar fills the marsh, inviting boggarts from every warren to reunite and feast.

cards.name: Forced Fruition
cards.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player draws seven cards.
cards.flavor:
"Petals within petals within petals, tadpole. The truth lurks below an opulence of illusion."
—Neerdiv, fallowsage

cards.name: Gaddock Teeg
cards.text:
Noncreature spells with converted mana cost 4 or greater can't be cast.
Noncreature spells with {X} in their mana costs can't be cast.
cards.flavor: So great is his wisdom and spirit that many who have met him say that they stood before a giant of a man and talked to the wisest of the four winds.

cards.name: Galepowder Mage
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Galepowder Mage attacks, exile another target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Garruk Wildspeaker
cards.text:
+1: Untap two target lands.
−1: Put a 3/3 green Beast creature token onto the battlefield.
−4: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

cards.name: Ghostly Changeling
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
{1}{B}: Ghostly Changeling gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: In desolate places, changelings may take the shape of fancies, or memories, or fears.

cards.name: Giant Harbinger
cards.text: When Giant Harbinger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Giant card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

cards.name: Giant's Ire
cards.text: Giant's Ire deals 4 damage to target player. If you control a Giant, draw a card.
cards.flavor: The only feeling greater than hurling something a mile is crushing something else with it that was really, really irritating you.

cards.name: Gilt-Leaf Ambush
cards.text: Put two 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature tokens onto the battlefield. Clash with an opponent. If you win, those creatures gain deathtouch until end of turn. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost. Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

cards.name: Gilt-Leaf Palace
cards.text:
As Gilt-Leaf Palace enters the battlefield, you may reveal an Elf card from your hand. If you don't, Gilt-Leaf Palace enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Dawn's Light, greatest palace of Gilt-Leaf Wood, is built on tiers of wood and power.

cards.name: Gilt-Leaf Seer
cards.text: {G}, {T}: Look at the top two cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
cards.flavor: Desmera blinded her seers so that her beauty would be the last image burned in their memories. The act only deepened their insight.

cards.name: Glarewielder
cards.text:
Haste
When Glarewielder enters the battlefield, up to two target creatures can't block this turn.
Evoke {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Glen Elendra Pranksters
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a spell during an opponent's turn, you may return target creature you control to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: Victims spirited through a faerie ring find themselves stranded miles away.

cards.name: Glimmerdust Nap
cards.text:
Enchant tapped creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
cards.flavor: The dreams of giants are as long as time and as deep as the earth. Thus they are prized by the dream-harvesting fae.

cards.name: Goatnapper
cards.text: When Goatnapper enters the battlefield, untap target Goat and gain control of it until end of turn. It gains haste until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Kith goats are just for practice. The real prize, of course, is a giant's cloudgoat.

cards.name: Goldmeadow Dodger
cards.text: Goldmeadow Dodger can't be blocked by creatures with power 4 or greater.
cards.flavor: "I've gotten close enough to a giant to smell his breath, but none has ever so much as spotted me. I wonder how long my record can extend?"

cards.name: Goldmeadow Harrier
cards.text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
cards.flavor:
"It's a proven fact that sling-stones from the dawn side of the riverbank sail the farthest and truest."
—Deagan, cenn of Burrenton

cards.name: Goldmeadow Stalwart
cards.text: As an additional cost to cast Goldmeadow Stalwart, reveal a Kithkin card from your hand or pay {3}.
cards.flavor: The thoughtweft ties a clachan together. Sharing each other's hopes and fears, all the village's citizens spring into action upon the first threat to any one of them.

cards.name: Guardian of Cloverdell
cards.text:
When Guardian of Cloverdell enters the battlefield, put three 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.
{G}, Sacrifice a Kithkin: You gain 1 life.
cards.flavor: Although they're protective of all creatures, many treefolk are especially fond of the empathic kithkin.

cards.name: Guile
cards.text:
Guile can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.
If a spell or ability you control would counter a spell, instead exile that spell and you may play that card without paying its mana cost.
When Guile is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

cards.name: Hamletback Goliath
cards.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may put X +1/+1 counters on Hamletback Goliath, where X is that creature's power.
cards.flavor:
"If you live on a giant's back, there's only one individual you'll ever need to fear."
—Gaddock Teeg

cards.name: Harpoon Sniper
cards.text: {W}, {T}: Harpoon Sniper deals X damage to target attacking or blocking creature, where X is the number of Merfolk you control.
cards.flavor: Made from whiskergill bones, merrow spinebows can fire bolts through tree trunks.

cards.name: Heal the Scars
cards.text: Regenerate target creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
cards.flavor: Elvish battle-magic has evolved two specialties: inflicting wounds that scar, and healing wounds without scarring. Politics determines the recipients of each.

cards.name: Hearthcage Giant
cards.text:
When Hearthcage Giant enters the battlefield, put two 3/1 red Elemental Shaman creature tokens onto the battlefield.
Sacrifice an Elemental: Target Giant creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The flamekin are mere kindling for his warmth.

cards.name: Heat Shimmer
cards.text: Put a token that's a copy of target creature onto the battlefield. That token has haste and "At the beginning of the end step, exile this permanent."
cards.flavor:
"Better to flare out than to gutter."
—Flamekin expression

cards.name: Herbal Poultice
cards.text: {3}, Sacrifice Herbal Poultice: Regenerate target creature.
cards.flavor:
"Apply orange leaf to a wound at dawn to clean it, at dusk to prevent the same injury from happening again."
—Kithkin superstition

cards.name: Hillcomber Giant
cards.text: Mountainwalk
cards.flavor: The giants believe the fossils they find in Lorwyn's rocky heights are dreams frozen in time, and they treasure them.

cards.name: Hoarder's Greed
cards.text: You lose 2 life and draw two cards, then clash with an opponent. If you win, repeat this process. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)

cards.name: Hoofprints of the Stag
cards.text:
Whenever you draw a card, you may put a hoofprint counter on Hoofprints of the Stag.
{2}{W}, Remove four hoofprint counters from Hoofprints of the Stag: Put a 4/4 white Elemental creature token with flying onto the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your turn.

cards.name: Horde of Notions
cards.text:
Vigilance, trample, haste
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: You may play target Elemental card from your graveyard without paying its mana cost.
cards.flavor: Even the oldest treefolk was but an acorn when Lorwyn's first mysteries were born.

cards.name: Hornet Harasser
cards.text: When Hornet Harasser dies, target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"And though she didn't get her honey, Auntie found something far more interesting."
—A tale of Auntie Grub

cards.name: Hostility
cards.text:
Haste
If a spell you control would deal damage to an opponent, prevent that damage. Put a 3/1 red Elemental Shaman creature token with haste onto the battlefield for each 1 damage prevented this way.
When Hostility is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

cards.name: Howltooth Hollow
cards.text:
Hideaway (This land enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom of your library.)
{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
{B}, {T}: You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost if each player has no cards in hand.

cards.name: Hunt Down
cards.text: Target creature blocks target creature this turn if able.
cards.flavor: "Springjacks and faeries can be difficult to hunt, but my favorite prey are the flamekin. They never fail to put up a worthy fight when cornered."

cards.name: Hunter of Eyeblights
cards.text:
When Hunter of Eyeblights enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you don't control.
{2}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature with a counter on it.
cards.flavor: Snokk ran as fast as he could, but the sound of hooves grew ever louder in his ears.

cards.name: Hurly-Burly
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Hurly-Burly deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
• Hurly-Burly deals 1 damage to each creature with flying.
cards.flavor:
"Things were popping like corn in a skillet. Olly landed in the pig pen with his prize sow on top of him, both squealin' like boggarts."
—Deagan, cenn of Burrenton

cards.name: Immaculate Magistrate
cards.text: {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature for each Elf you control.
cards.flavor: Elves of the immaculate class weave flora into living creatures—sometimes to endorse an elite warrior, sometimes to create a breathing work of art.

cards.name: Imperious Perfect
cards.text:
Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1.
{G}, {T}: Put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: In a culture of beauty, the most beautiful are worshipped as gods.

cards.name: Incandescent Soulstoke
cards.text:
Other Elemental creatures you control get +1/+1.
{1}{R}, {T}: You may put an Elemental creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Incendiary Command
cards.text:
Choose two —
• Incendiary Command deals 4 damage to target player.
• Incendiary Command deals 2 damage to each creature.
• Destroy target nonbasic land.
• Each player discards all the cards in his or her hand, then draws that many cards.

cards.name: Incremental Growth
cards.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, two +1/+1 counters on another target creature, and three +1/+1 counters on a third target creature.
cards.flavor:
"Tie a mouse under a bridge, and your cabbages will triple in size."
—Kithkin superstition

cards.name: Ingot Chewer
cards.text:
When Ingot Chewer enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.
Evoke {R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)
cards.flavor: Elementals are ideas given form. This one is the idea of "smashitude."

cards.name: Inkfathom Divers
cards.text:
Islandwalk
When Inkfathom Divers enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
cards.flavor:
"None appreciate sun and shallows like those who have seen the depths."
—Lianda of the Stonybrook school

cards.name: Inner-Flame Acolyte
cards.text:
When Inner-Flame Acolyte enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
Evoke {R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Inner-Flame Igniter
cards.text: {2}{R}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. If this is the third time this ability has resolved this turn, creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor: A light an army can follow.

cards.name: Jace Beleren
cards.text:
+2: Each player draws a card.
−1: Target player draws a card.
−10: Target player puts the top twenty cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

cards.name: Jagged-Scar Archers
cards.text:
Jagged-Scar Archers's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Elves you control.
{T}: Jagged-Scar Archers deals damage equal to its power to target creature with flying.

cards.name: Judge of Currents
cards.text: Whenever a Merfolk you control becomes tapped, you may gain 1 life.
cards.flavor: Though the currents of the Lanes shift every year, the merrow never lose track of where they are or where they are going.

cards.name: Kinsbaile Balloonist
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Kinsbaile Balloonist attacks, you may have target creature gain flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Even when a giant's tantrum turns the sky into a chaotic gale, the path of the balloonist never falters.

cards.name: Kinsbaile Skirmisher
cards.text: When Kinsbaile Skirmisher enters the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "If a boggart even dares breathe near one of my kin, I'll know. And I'll not be happy."

cards.name: Kithkin Daggerdare
cards.text: {G}, {T}: Target attacking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The kith dance their elaborate reels not merely to celebrate the events of their lives but to form an unbreakable bond of loyalty with their kin, a bond stronger than the fear of death itself.

cards.name: Kithkin Greatheart
cards.text: As long as you control a Giant, Kithkin Greatheart gets +1/+1 and has first strike.
cards.flavor: Sometimes a curious giant singles out a "little one" to follow for a few days, never realizing the effect it will have on the little one's life.

cards.name: Kithkin Harbinger
cards.text: When Kithkin Harbinger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Kithkin card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
cards.flavor: Her ears are open to even the softest voice.

cards.name: Kithkin Healer
cards.text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
cards.flavor: The empathetic nature of the thoughtweft allows kithkin healers to treat the cause of an illness rather than fight its symptoms.

cards.name: Kithkin Mourncaller
cards.text: Whenever an attacking Kithkin or Elf is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may draw a card.
cards.flavor: Eidren's hunts are dangerous affairs. All dread the inevitable recounting of those who died while flushing out his prey.

cards.name: Knight of Meadowgrain
cards.text:
First strike
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
cards.flavor: "By tradition, we don't speak for two days after battle. If our deeds won't speak for themselves, what else could be said?"

cards.name: Knucklebone Witch
cards.text: Whenever a Goblin you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Knucklebone Witch.
cards.flavor: Each bone honors its owner's best pranks.

cards.name: Lace with Moonglove
cards.text:
Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy that creature.)
Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"Which is more filled with poison: the flower of the moonglove or the minds of elves?"
—Vessifrus, flamekin demagogue

cards.name: Lairwatch Giant
cards.text:
Lairwatch Giant can block an additional creature.
Whenever Lairwatch Giant blocks two or more creatures, it gains first strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor: A giant can brood over a grudge for decades, and woe to those who interrupt him.

cards.name: Lammastide Weave
cards.text:
Name a card, then target player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard. If that card is the named card, you gain life equal to its converted mana cost.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: "A ribbon torn will ward away dark dreams."

cards.name: Lash Out
cards.text: Lash Out deals 3 damage to target creature. Clash with an opponent. If you win, Lash Out deals 3 damage to that creature's controller. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)

cards.name: Leaf Gilder
cards.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Eidren, perfect of Lys Alana, ordered hundreds of trees uprooted and rearranged into a pattern he deemed beautiful. Thus the Gilt-Leaf Wood was born.

cards.name: Lignify
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature is a Treefolk with base power and toughness 0/4 and loses all abilities.
cards.flavor: Bulgo paused, puzzled. What was that rustling sound, and why did he feel so stiff? And how could his feet be so thirsty?

cards.name: Liliana Vess
cards.text:
+1: Target player discards a card.
−2: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
−8: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.

cards.name: Lowland Oaf
cards.text: {T}: Target Goblin creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains flying until end of turn. Sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor: "I don't know why the little one was so mad. He said to put him down, and I put him down."

cards.name: Lys Alana Huntmaster
cards.text: Whenever you cast an Elf spell, you may put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: From the highest tiers of Dawn's Light Palace to the deepest shade of Wren's Run, the silver notes of the horn shimmer through the air, and all who hear it feel its pull.

cards.name: Lys Alana Scarblade
cards.text: {T}, Discard an Elf card: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves you control.
cards.flavor: In beauty-obsessed Lys Alana, one cut of her blade means the difference between a high society feast and raking through the dungheap for scraps.

cards.name: Mad Auntie
cards.text:
Other Goblin creatures you control get +1/+1.
{T}: Regenerate another target Goblin.
cards.flavor: One part cunning, one part wise, and many, many parts demented.

cards.name: Makeshift Mannequin
cards.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a mannequin counter on it. For as long as that creature has a mannequin counter on it, it has "When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it."
cards.flavor:
"This vulgar mimicry will end now."
—Desmera, perfect of Wren's Run

cards.name: Marsh Flitter
cards.text:
Flying
When Marsh Flitter enters the battlefield, put two 1/1 black Goblin Rogue creature tokens onto the battlefield.
Sacrifice a Goblin: Marsh Flitter has base power and toughness 3/3 until end of turn.

cards.name: Masked Admirers
cards.text:
When Masked Admirers enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may pay {G}{G}. If you do, return Masked Admirers from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: "Beauty determines value, and we determine beauty."

cards.name: Merrow Commerce
cards.text: At the beginning of your end step, untap all Merfolk you control.
cards.flavor: Schools meet and mingle on Lorwyn's riverways. In the bustling interplay, the merrow renew their sense of community as they sharpen their wits and hone their trading skills.

cards.name: Merrow Harbinger
cards.text:
Islandwalk
When Merrow Harbinger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Merfolk card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

cards.name: Merrow Reejerey
cards.text:
Other Merfolk creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever you cast a Merfolk spell, you may tap or untap target permanent.
cards.flavor: Steady and silent as the deep current, the reejerey guides the course of the school.

cards.name: Militia's Pride
cards.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control attacks, you may pay {W}. If you do, put a 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature token onto the battlefield tapped and attacking.
cards.flavor: If you pick a fight with one kithkin, be ready to fight them all.

cards.name: Mirror Entity
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
{X}: Creatures you control become X/X and gain all creature types until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Unaware of Lorwyn's diversity, it sees only itself, reflected a thousand times over.

cards.name: Mistbind Clique
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
Champion a Faerie (When this enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another Faerie you control. When this leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.)
When a Faerie is championed with Mistbind Clique, tap all lands target player controls.

cards.name: Moonglove Extract
cards.text: Sacrifice Moonglove Extract: Moonglove Extract deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: Diluted, moonglove can etch living tissue. Concentrated, a drop will kill a giant.

cards.name: Moonglove Winnower
cards.text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
cards.flavor: Winnowers live to eliminate eyeblights, creatures the elves deem too ugly to exist.

cards.name: Mosswort Bridge
cards.text:
Hideaway (This land enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom of your library.)
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
{G}, {T}: You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost if creatures you control have total power 10 or greater.

cards.name: Mournwhelk
cards.text:
When Mournwhelk enters the battlefield, target player discards two cards.
Evoke {3}{B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)
cards.flavor: It hoards Lorwyn's rare sorrows.

cards.name: Mudbutton Torchrunner
cards.text: When Mudbutton Torchrunner dies, it deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: The oil sloshes against his skull as he nears his destination: the Frogtosser Games and the lighting of the Flaming Boggart.

cards.name: Mulldrifter
cards.text:
Flying
When Mulldrifter enters the battlefield, draw two cards.
Evoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Nameless Inversion
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
Target creature gets +3/-3 and loses all creature types until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Just as a changeling's influence can have dramatic effects, so too can its sudden withdrawal.

cards.name: Nath of the Gilt-Leaf
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have target opponent discard a card at random.
Whenever an opponent discards a card, you may put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: A savage hunter with a prince's bearing.

cards.name: Nath's Buffoon
cards.text: Protection from Elves
cards.flavor: Smik learned the elvish dance quickly enough. The most difficult, yet most important step was to stay out of Nath's sight until called to perform.

cards.name: Nath's Elite
cards.text:
All creatures able to block Nath's Elite do so.
When Nath's Elite enters the battlefield, clash with an opponent. If you win, put a +1/+1 counter on Nath's Elite. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)

cards.name: Neck Snap
cards.text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.
cards.flavor:
"We merrows need not be disadvantaged when fighting on land. We lack the vulnerability of those who breathe only through their throats."
—Minnarin, merrow reejerey

cards.name: Nectar Faerie
cards.text:
Flying
{B}, {T}: Target Faerie or Elf gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
cards.flavor:
"The unpredictable fae are just as likely to provide a blight as a boon."
—Desmera, perfect of Wren's Run

cards.name: Needle Drop
cards.text:
Needle Drop deals 1 damage to target creature or player that was dealt damage this turn.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"First it was plovers and mulldrifters. Now it's knitting needles the size of javelins."
—Calydd, kithkin farmer

cards.name: Nettlevine Blight
cards.text:
Enchant creature or land
Enchanted permanent has "At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice this permanent and attach Nettlevine Blight to a creature or land you control."

cards.name: Nightshade Stinger
cards.text:
Flying
Nightshade Stinger can't block.
cards.flavor:
"Most faeries are harmless pranksters. Every now and again, though, you get one that crosses over from mischievous to malicious."
—Gaddock Teeg

cards.name: Nova Chaser
cards.text:
Trample
Champion an Elemental (When this enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another Elemental you control. When this leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.)

cards.name: Oaken Brawler
cards.text: When Oaken Brawler enters the battlefield, clash with an opponent. If you win, put a +1/+1 counter on Oaken Brawler. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)

cards.name: Oakgnarl Warrior
cards.text: Vigilance, trample
cards.flavor: "Roam as you will, your roots remain in the strong earth of your Rising."

cards.name: Oblivion Ring
cards.text:
When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent.
When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
cards.flavor: A circle of sugar and a word of forbiddance.

cards.name: Oona's Prowler
cards.text:
Flying
Discard a card: Oona's Prowler gets -2/-0 until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.
cards.flavor: Deep in Glen Elendra blossoms Oona, queen of the faeries, nourished by secrets and pollinated by stolen dreams.

cards.name: Paperfin Rascal
cards.text: When Paperfin Rascal enters the battlefield, clash with an opponent. If you win, put a +1/+1 counter on Paperfin Rascal. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)

cards.name: Peppersmoke
cards.text: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. If you control a Faerie, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Like being trapped in a perpetual sneeze, faerie-dust poisoning is both exhilarating and agonizing.

cards.name: Pestermite
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
When Pestermite enters the battlefield, you may tap or untap target permanent.
cards.flavor: The fae know when they're not wanted. That's precisely why they show up.

cards.name: Plover Knights
cards.text: Flying, first strike
cards.flavor: The knights are a major attraction at every Lammastide festival. Teams of riders perform daring feats of flight to the delight of all below.

cards.name: Pollen Lullaby
cards.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. Clash with an opponent. If you win, creatures that player controls don't untap during the player's next untap step. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)

cards.name: Ponder
cards.text:
Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle your library.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: "We see the same sky as you, just through a different lens."

cards.name: Primal Command
cards.text:
Choose two —
• Target player gains 7 life.
• Put target noncreature permanent on top of its owner's library.
• Target player shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.
• Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Profane Command
cards.text:
Choose two — 
• Target player loses X life. 
• Return target creature card with converted mana cost X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
• Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.
• Up to X target creatures gain fear until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

cards.name: Protective Bubble
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked and has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
cards.flavor: Skilled merrow rudders ensure their charges arrive on time and without incident.

cards.name: Prowess of the Fair
cards.text: Whenever another nontoken Elf is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: An elvish duel is a thing of beauty: the warriors' grace, the crash of steel, then the artful spray of blood.

cards.name: Purity
cards.text:
Flying
If noncombat damage would be dealt to you, prevent that damage. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.
When Purity is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

cards.name: Quill-Slinger Boggart
cards.text: Whenever a player casts a Kithkin spell, you may have target player lose 1 life.
cards.flavor:
"A good day in Goldmeadow is one in which I don't spend all evening picking quills out of my backside."
—Calydd, kithkin farmer

cards.name: Rebellion of the Flamekin
cards.text: Whenever you clash, you may pay {1}. If you do, put a 3/1 red Elemental Shaman creature token onto the battlefield. If you won, that token gains haste until end of turn. (This ability triggers after the clash ends.)

cards.name: Rings of Brighthearth
cards.text: Whenever you activate an ability, if it isn't a mana ability, you may pay {2}. If you do, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.
cards.flavor:
"Without flame, there would be no iron tools, no cooked meals, no purge of old growth to make room for new."
—Brighthearth creed

cards.name: Ringskipper
cards.text:
Flying
When Ringskipper dies, clash with an opponent. If you win, return Ringskipper to its owner's hand. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)

cards.name: Rootgrapple
cards.text: Destroy target noncreature permanent. If you control a Treefolk, draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"All the sylvan secrets of this world are etched between my rings. The skinfolk's metal aberrations can rot between my roots."
—Colfenor, the Last Yew

cards.name: Runed Stalactite
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and is every creature type.
Equip {2}
cards.flavor: When a changeling adopts a form no other changeling has taken, a rune appears in the caverns of Velis Vel to mark the event.

cards.name: Scarred Vinebreeder
cards.text: {2}{B}, Exile an Elf card from your graveyard: Scarred Vinebreeder gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: For disfigured elves, there are few choices beyond death or nettlevine.

cards.name: Scattering Stroke
cards.text: Counter target spell. Clash with an opponent. If you win, at the beginning of your next main phase, you may add {X} to your mana pool, where X is that spell's converted mana cost. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)

cards.name: Scion of Oona
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
Other Faerie creatures you control get +1/+1.
Other Faeries you control have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)

cards.name: Secluded Glen
cards.text:
As Secluded Glen enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Faerie card from your hand. If you don't, Secluded Glen enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Protected by glamers and guile, Glen Elendra harbors the elusive Oona, queen of the fae.

cards.name: Seedguide Ash
cards.text: When Seedguide Ash dies, you may search your library for up to three Forest cards and put them onto the battlefield tapped. If you do, shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: "May you shade three generations of seedlings."

cards.name: Sentinels of Glen Elendra
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
cards.flavor: Some say the valley of Glen Elendra is mythical, and that rumors of its existence are nothing but a faerie prank. Others say it is the fae's most fiercely guarded secret.

cards.name: Sentry Oak
cards.text:
Defender
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may clash with an opponent. If you win, Sentry Oak gets +2/+0 and loses defender until end of turn. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)

cards.name: Shapesharer
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
{2}{U}: Target Shapeshifter becomes a copy of target creature until your next turn.
cards.flavor: One good mimic deserves another.

cards.name: Shelldock Isle
cards.text:
Hideaway (This land enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom of your library.)
{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.
{U}, {T}: You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost if a library has twenty or fewer cards in it.

cards.name: Shields of Velis Vel
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
Creatures target player controls get +0/+1 and gain all creature types until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Changelings can alter shape based on what the beings around them desire most.

cards.name: Shimmering Grotto
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Once each year, the sun's rays reach the hidden chamber of Velis Vel, and the changelings congregate from afar to bathe in the ever-shifting light.

cards.name: Shriekmaw
cards.text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
When Shriekmaw enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature.
Evoke {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Silvergill Adept
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Silvergill Adept, reveal a Merfolk card from your hand or pay {3}.
When Silvergill Adept enters the battlefield, draw a card.
cards.flavor: "I bring baubles of lore, lost secrets seined from the listening waves."

cards.name: Silvergill Douser
cards.text: {T}: Target creature gets -X/-0 until end of turn, where X is the number of Merfolk and/or Faeries you control.
cards.flavor: The Silvergill school monitors traffic on the Lanes, ensuring that the riffraff don't interfere with travelers.

cards.name: Skeletal Changeling
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
{1}{B}: Regenerate Skeletal Changeling.
cards.flavor: Though they lack true flesh and bone of their own, changelings imitate either with equal ease.

cards.name: Smokebraider
cards.text: {T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast Elemental spells or activate abilities of Elementals.
cards.flavor: "Be silent and listen to your inner fire. Only then can you walk the Path of Flame."

cards.name: Soaring Hope
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Soaring Hope enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
Enchanted creature has flying.
{W}: Put Soaring Hope on top of its owner's library.

cards.name: Soulbright Flamekin
cards.text: {2}: Target creature gains trample until end of turn. If this is the third time this ability has resolved this turn, you may add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: When provoked, a flamekin's inner fire burns far hotter than any giant's forge.

cards.name: Sower of Temptation
cards.text:
Flying
When Sower of Temptation enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature for as long as Sower of Temptation remains on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: One glamer leads him far from home. The next washes away his memory that home was ever anywhere but at her side.

cards.name: Spellstutter Sprite
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
When Spellstutter Sprite enters the battlefield, counter target spell with converted mana cost X or less, where X is the number of Faeries you control.

cards.name: Spiderwig Boggart
cards.text: When Spiderwig Boggart enters the battlefield, target creature gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
cards.flavor: Auntie Flint was the first to pioneer the spiderwig, a mass of arachnids intended to be worn rather than eaten.

cards.name: Spinerock Knoll
cards.text:
Hideaway (This land enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom of your library.)
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.
{R}, {T}: You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost if an opponent was dealt 7 or more damage this turn.

cards.name: Spring Cleaning
cards.text: Destroy target enchantment. Clash with an opponent. If you win, destroy all enchantments your opponents control. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)

cards.name: Springjack Knight
cards.text: Whenever Springjack Knight attacks, clash with an opponent. If you win, target creature gains double strike until end of turn. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)

cards.name: Springleaf Drum
cards.text: {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: After trying mudskippers for an afternoon, Scratch decided that crickcarp made the best noise.

cards.name: Squeaking Pie Sneak
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Squeaking Pie Sneak, reveal a Goblin card from your hand or pay {3}.
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
cards.flavor:
"Why do our pies squeak? It's all the faeries, mice, and prickly-hogs we stuff inside."
—Borb of the Squeaking Pie warren

cards.name: Stinkdrinker Daredevil
cards.text: Giant spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
cards.flavor: Boggarts constantly strive to outdo each other with the things they bring back to the warren, each hoping the exploit will become as well-known as those of Auntie Grub.

cards.name: Stonybrook Angler
cards.text: {1}{U}, {T}: You may tap or untap target creature.
cards.flavor: "Water is in the air, the trees, and the earth. Understand its motion, speak its language, and the subtle currents that flow through all living things will fall under your command."

cards.name: Streambed Aquitects
cards.text:
{T}: Target Merfolk creature gets +1/+1 and gains islandwalk until end of turn.
{T}: Target land becomes an Island until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"We look in the river and see scattered stones. A merrow looks and sees a map of Lorwyn."
—Illulia, flamekin soulstoke

cards.name: Summon the School
cards.text:
Put two 1/1 blue Merfolk Wizard creature tokens onto the battlefield.
Tap four untapped Merfolk you control: Return Summon the School from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor:
"When merrows talk, listeners grow fins."
—Kithkin saying

cards.name: Sunrise Sovereign
cards.text: Other Giant creatures you control get +2/+2 and have trample.
cards.flavor: A hundred generations has he mentored, a hundred armies has he crushed beneath his feet, yet only a hundred words has he ever spoken, each more revered than a hundred books.

cards.name: Surge of Thoughtweft
cards.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If you control a Kithkin, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Kithkin weave together their very thoughts, creating a depth of cooperation unknown to other races.

cards.name: Surgespanner
cards.text: Whenever Surgespanner becomes tapped, you may pay {1}{U}. If you do, return target permanent to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: They ride on waves of Æther, washing out anything that might pollute the Merrow Lanes.

cards.name: Sygg, River Guide
cards.text:
Islandwalk
{1}{W}: Target Merfolk you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "If there's a place worth going, the Merrow Lanes already do. And if there's a route worth taking, yours truly already has."

cards.name: Sylvan Echoes
cards.text: Whenever you clash and win, you may draw a card. (This ability triggers after the clash ends.)
cards.flavor: It takes a huntmaster's eye to discern the contours of mythical prey.

cards.name: Tar Pitcher
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Tar Pitcher deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor:
"Auntie Grub had caught a goat, a bleating doe that still squirmed in her arms. At the same time, her warren decided to share with her a sensory greeting of hot tar . . . ."
—A tale of Auntie Grub

cards.name: Tarfire
cards.text: Tarfire deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor:
"After Auntie brushed the soot from her eyes, she discovered something wonderful: the fire had turned the goat into something that smelled delicious."
—A tale of Auntie Grub

cards.name: Thieving Sprite
cards.text:
Flying
When Thieving Sprite enters the battlefield, target player reveals X cards from his or her hand, where X is the number of Faeries you control. You choose one of those cards. That player discards that card.

cards.name: Thorn of Amethyst
cards.text: Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.
cards.flavor: Mined from a cave in the Dark Meanders, it shines brightest when no one is looking.

cards.name: Thorntooth Witch
cards.text: Whenever you cast a Treefolk spell, you may have target creature get +3/-3 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The crone's boughs creaked as she spoke. "You look peaked, little one. Come, sip from my warm brew. It'll have you blooming in no time."

cards.name: Thoughtseize
cards.text: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.
cards.flavor: "Any dream is a robust harvest. Still, I prefer the timeworn dreams, heavy with import, that haunt the obsessive mind."

cards.name: Thoughtweft Trio
cards.text:
First strike, vigilance
Champion a Kithkin (When this enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another Kithkin you control. When this leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.)
Thoughtweft Trio can block any number of creatures.

cards.name: Thousand-Year Elixir
cards.text:
You may activate abilities of creatures you control as though those creatures had haste.
{1}, {T}: Untap target creature.
cards.flavor: Paradoxically, to tilt the massive jug for a sip, you'd need the energy of the giant's tonic.

cards.name: Thundercloud Shaman
cards.text: When Thundercloud Shaman enters the battlefield, it deals damage equal to the number of Giants you control to each non-Giant creature.
cards.flavor: He cares not for the disasters his storm brings as long as his path ahead is clear.

cards.name: Tideshaper Mystic
cards.text: {T}: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn. Activate this ability only during your turn.
cards.flavor: He paints with drop and shimmer a world that exists only in the wistful heart.

cards.name: Timber Protector
cards.text:
Other Treefolk creatures you control get +1/+1.
Other Treefolk and Forests you control have indestructible.
cards.flavor: In his presence, an ordinary grove becomes a bastion to turn spells and break armies.

cards.name: Treefolk Harbinger
cards.text: When Treefolk Harbinger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Treefolk or Forest card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

cards.name: Triclopean Sight
cards.text:
Flash
Enchant creature
When Triclopean Sight enters the battlefield, untap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has vigilance.

cards.name: Turtleshell Changeling
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
{1}{U}: Switch Turtleshell Changeling's power and toughness until end of turn.
cards.flavor: A changeling involuntarily mimics the nearest being at hand, sometimes trading a borrowed shell for borrowed claws.

cards.name: Twinning Glass
cards.text: {1}, {T}: You may cast a nonland card from your hand without paying its mana cost if it has the same name as a spell that was cast this turn.
cards.flavor: It takes two to craft a mirror: a practiced metalsmith to silver one side and her own hazy reflection to polish the other.

cards.name: Veteran of the Depths
cards.text: Whenever Veteran of the Depths becomes tapped, you may put a +1/+1 counter on it.
cards.flavor: In the backwaters of the Merrow Lanes lie stones scarred with tallies of countless generations, each representing a victory of merrow soldiers.

cards.name: Vigor
cards.text:
Trample
If damage would be dealt to a creature you control other than Vigor, prevent that damage. Put a +1/+1 counter on that creature for each 1 damage prevented this way.
When Vigor is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

cards.name: Vivid Crag
cards.text:
Vivid Crag enters the battlefield tapped with two charge counters on it.
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.
{T}, Remove a charge counter from Vivid Crag: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

cards.name: Vivid Creek
cards.text:
Vivid Creek enters the battlefield tapped with two charge counters on it.
{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.
{T}, Remove a charge counter from Vivid Creek: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

cards.name: Vivid Grove
cards.text:
Vivid Grove enters the battlefield tapped with two charge counters on it.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
{T}, Remove a charge counter from Vivid Grove: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

cards.name: Vivid Marsh
cards.text:
Vivid Marsh enters the battlefield tapped with two charge counters on it.
{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
{T}, Remove a charge counter from Vivid Marsh: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

cards.name: Vivid Meadow
cards.text:
Vivid Meadow enters the battlefield tapped with two charge counters on it.
{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.
{T}, Remove a charge counter from Vivid Meadow: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

cards.name: Wanderer's Twig
cards.text: {1}, Sacrifice Wanderer's Twig: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: For every tree who falls, there are countless sprouts waiting to rise.

cards.name: Wanderwine Hub
cards.text:
As Wanderwine Hub enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Merfolk card from your hand. If you don't, Wanderwine Hub enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Below the great river, a bustling hub channels the flow of merrow trade.

cards.name: Wanderwine Prophets
cards.text:
Champion a Merfolk (When this enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another Merfolk you control. When this leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.)
Whenever Wanderwine Prophets deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice a Merfolk. If you do, take an extra turn after this one.

cards.name: Warren Pilferers
cards.text: When Warren Pilferers enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If that card is a Goblin card, Warren Pilferers gains haste until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "What do they need all this stuff for? They're dead. We're alive. Simple enough."

cards.name: Warren-Scourge Elf
cards.text: Protection from Goblins
cards.flavor:
"If one can associate any virtue with the eyeblights, it is the talent some achieve in disposing of them. I have seen the slaying of boggarts raised nearly to an art form."
—Fiala, Gilt-Leaf winnower

cards.name: Weed Strangle
cards.text: Destroy target creature. Clash with an opponent. If you win, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)

cards.name: Wellgabber Apothecary
cards.text: {1}{W}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target tapped Merfolk or Kithkin creature this turn.
cards.flavor: "You've discovered that boggarts bite, I see. And will the militia be chasing this lot? . . . Ah, you're staying in town to avoid Nath's hunt. Wise. Now this poultice . . ."

cards.name: Whirlpool Whelm
cards.text: Clash with an opponent, then return target creature to its owner's hand. If you win, you may put that creature on top of its owner's library instead. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)

cards.name: Wild Ricochet
cards.text: You may choose new targets for target instant or sorcery spell. Then copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
cards.flavor: "I knew that trick long before your great-grandmother's great-grandmother was born."

cards.name: Windbrisk Heights
cards.text:
Hideaway (This land enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom of your library.)
{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.
{W}, {T}: You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost if you attacked with three or more creatures this turn.

cards.name: Wings of Velis Vel
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
Until end of turn, target creature has base power and toughness 4/4, gains all creature types, and gains flying.
cards.flavor: Changeling magic grants unusual wishes.

cards.name: Wispmare
cards.text:
Flying
When Wispmare enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.
Evoke {W} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Wizened Cenn
cards.text: Other Kithkin creatures you control get +1/+1.
cards.flavor: "Thoughtweft binds us together as one, part of an intricate pattern that would unravel if even one thread came loose."

cards.name: Woodland Changeling
cards.text: Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
cards.flavor: Changelings cannot resist the draw of a new shape, even if doing so would be in their best interests.

cards.name: Woodland Guidance
cards.text:
Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. Clash with an opponent. If you win, untap all Forests you control. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)
Exile Woodland Guidance.

cards.name: Wort, Boggart Auntie
cards.text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return target Goblin card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: Auntie always knows which berries to lick, which kithkin to trick, and what to do when either goes wrong.

cards.name: Wren's Run Packmaster
cards.text:
Champion an Elf (When this creature enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another Elf you control. When this creature leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.)
{2}{G}: Put a 2/2 green Wolf creature token onto the battlefield.
Wolves you control have deathtouch.

cards.name: Wren's Run Vanquisher
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Wren's Run Vanquisher, reveal an Elf card from your hand or pay {3}.
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

cards.name: Wydwen, the Biting Gale
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
{U}{B}, Pay 1 life: Return Wydwen, the Biting Gale to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: In a world of bright, cloudless skies, she is the dark storm on the horizon.

cards.name: Zephyr Net
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has defender and flying.
cards.flavor: Faeries hang beings that interest them as ornaments in the sky, each clique competing to outshine the prize of the last.
